summary: In the brewery it’s long been the tradition for the coopers to select the tree and then decorate it.
It’s a Christmas tradition in the brewery that every year the coopers choose the tree for the brewery grounds and then decorate it.
#Tankovna Pilsner Urquell is now pouring in the heart of London's Soho at The Duck and Rice, where the unpasteurised Pilsner Urquell is a great match for the modern Chinese food #NaZdravi.
These are the Saaz hops that we use to brew Pilsner Urquell, all grown in the town of Zatec, just 80km away from the brewery.
This year, 45,000 people joined us at the brewery to celebrate the anniversary of the first brew of Pilsner Urquell.
messages:
Pavel Pressburg is a Czech Tapster who comes from a family with three generations of experience behind the bar. We sat down over a couple of fresh Pilsners to talk about the perfect pouring technique. #BetterWithFoam
http://pilsnerurquell.com/us/article/tapster-tradition-behind-bar-pavel-pressburg. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

We're getting into the Christmas spirit here at the brewery.
The coopers created these one-of-a-kind ornaments for our 
tree. Happy holidays, and #NaZdravi! Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

We recently commissioned a leading young Czech designer, Maxim Velčovský, to create this very special bottle and 9 others like it. This week we auctioned them off for charity. We’re proud to say we raised £36,368! #NaZdravi for a good cause! Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
The brewery coopers don’t just carve wooden barrels… #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

This is the reward for every Tapster who passes their week-long training at the brewery in Plzeň. Their own toolkit includes a personalised apron and tap handle, plus everything they need to help them manage their taps and pour perfect glasses of Pilsner Urquell #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

Wish you could smell these amazing fresh Czech Saaz hops! They’ve been picked, dried, packed and are being sent to Plzen where they give their fine bitterness and beautiful aroma to our beer #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

Drink around Prague and you'll see some great and unique beer taps. This is 'U Dvou Koček’ or ‘At The Two Cats’. They also pour a great glass of Pilsner Urquell #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

Traditions are important for us. Every Easter we send a blessed batch of Pilsner Urquell to the Vatican. Also this year, as a special gift, Brewmaster Vaclav Berka will be present with a barrel of unfiltered Pilsner Urquell at a celebration in Rome.

Here we have Plzen’s Bishop, Frantisek Radkovský, blessing the ingredients before the brew and then the 2016 bottles which have made the 1,300km journey. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
From Plzen to England! #NaZdravi and cheers to fresh #Tankovna, perfect pints and great food. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
Prost to Pilsner in Berlin! There are some great #Tankovna bars in the city #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

We say Na Zdravi, they say Salute! Here’s a few pictures of pubs around Italy pouring Pilsner Urquell, with Pils Pub Milano, Cheers Milano, Hop Bari and Bar San Pierino. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

Have you drunk Pilsners in Poland? If not then take a look at a couple of great places pouring #Tankova beer: AïOLI inspired by MINI and Restauracja Česká Warszawa  #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
Another dig through the archives today… Here’s some old beermats we’ve saved over the years. Anyone else collect them? #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
The beer hasn’t changed but the bottles and labels have. Do you have a favourite? #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

Our tap today vs the tap in 1843. Like the beer, some things don’t need to change #NaZdravi

Want to know where that tap was first used (and where you can still see it today)? Read this: http://pilsnerurquell.com/article/old-taps-and-new-taps. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

Who decorates the Christmas tree in your house? In the brewery it’s long been the tradition for the coopers to select the tree and then decorate it. Each year the coopers also produce a unique wooden carving for the tree and this year they worked with local carpenters who provided further decorations. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

Carved beneath the brewery, these cold cellars were key to brewing the #OriginalPilsner. And you can still walk through them today, and drink a beer down there, when you visit the brewery 

http://pilsnerurquell.com/article/brewery-cellars. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
As the Saaz hop harvest comes to an end in Zatec, here are some more images from last year #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

All the hops for a whole year are picked within a couple of weeks and it’s harvest time in the Czech Republic right now. These are the Saaz hops that we use to brew Pilsner Urquell, all grown in the town of Zatec, just 80km away from the brewery. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

#Tankovna Pilsner Urquell is now pouring in the heart of London's Soho at The Duck and Rice, where the unpasteurised Pilsner Urquell is a great match for the modern Chinese food #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

We’ve blessed the ingredients for our special Easter delivery to the Vatican. We’re sending 2015 bottles of Pilsner Urquell to the Holy See as our traditional gift #NaZdravi. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
The Old Town Square in Prague looks great at this time of year. Where’s your favourite Christmas market in the world? Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

It’s a Christmas tradition in the brewery that every year the coopers choose the tree for the brewery grounds and then decorate it. Who gets to choose the tree where you are? Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

We’ve been growing great mo’s ever since we started brewing beer in 1842, so we’re excited to be taking part in #Movember this year!

Our team of coopers in Plzen, along with Brewmaster Vaclav Berka, are growing their mo’s, taking tips from the main mo man Jiri. They've had a barber's shave and we'll keep you updated on how their mo-growing progresses. 

Help change the face of men's heath by taking part yourself at www.movember.com. Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.

This year, 45,000 people joined us at the brewery to celebrate the anniversary of the first brew of Pilsner Urquell. With beer, crafts, food and live music, here's Pilsner Fest! Photos from Pilsner Urquell's post.
